Name: Zombie Apocalypse - The Last Fortress
About the game: Welcome to Zombie Apocalypse â€“ The Last Fortress, where you must fight endless waves of zombies to survive for 30 days. With a variety of weapons, vehicles, explosives, soldiers and turrets at your disposal, you can mount your defense to protect the base. Strengthen your weapons with a wide variety of power-ups Position your soldiers strategically You must use all your resource management and strategy skills to defend yourself against huge waves of zombies and survive for 30 days in this thrilling game. You'll have access to a wide variety of weapons, vehicles, explosives, soldiers and turrets to help you in your battle against the undead. You'll need to carefully choose which items to buy and when to use them in order to survive the zombie hordes and emerge victorious. You'll also need to manage your resources wisely, as every decision you make can impact your chances of survival. You'll need to use your cunning and strategy to survive each night, as the zombies only get stronger and more numerous as time goes on. Do you have what it takes to survive the zombie apocalypse?
